item.title: U.S. Should Destroy Fordow — but Only If Israel Can’t
item.description: The U.S. should not pursue a regime-change war akin to Iraq, but a congressionally approved, limited operation should be on the table.

item.title: Texas Lawmakers Have Failed Their Constituents on Immigration Enforcement
item.description: The most recent session of the legislature adjourned without doing much of anything about aliens residing in Texas in violation of federal law.

item.title: Brian Wilson and the Memory of Patriotism
item.description: Recovering a music and film legacy in the age of rage.

item.title: While Defunding California High-Speed Rail, Don’t Forget Its Costly Northern Extension
item.description: Even if these projects made sense when first conceived, they no longer do.

item.title: OnlyFans (Finally) Discovers Its Red Line
item.description: But one must ask: What makes Bonnie Blue’s stunt more appalling than others on the platform?
